about_the_game:
"School Hero" is an electrifying maze chase game that challenges you to save your school by consuming bots and utilizing special weapons. Perfect for multiplayer fun, this game promises an action-packed experience and will be compatible with the Steam Deck for gaming on the go.

Key Features:

Maze Chase Thrills: Navigate mazes and devour bots in a fast-paced, exhilarating quest to protect your school.

Special Weapons: Equip and unleash special weapons to gain an edge in the pursuit of victory.

Multiplayer Madness: Enjoy hours of gaming excitement with friends in multiplayer mode, fostering fierce competition and unforgettable moments.

Steam Deck Compatible: Take the action wherever you go with compatibility on the Steam Deck, ensuring non-stop fun on the move.

"School Hero" is the ultimate multiplayer maze chase adventure, offering thrilling gameplay and hours of entertainment, all while saving your beloved school.
